markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ratfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=769)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 317 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [ratfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=82) ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
name: Ratfolk
